pages.text: TurtyWurty, for his modding tutorials that helped me understand the basics of modding.
Cy4's Modding, for his modding tutorials that helped me understand the basics of networking in mods and setting up configs.
Cryness Forge Tutorials, for his modding tutorials that helped me implement custom villagers & trades.
TelepathicGrunt for their structure tutorial that helped me implement custom structures.
Jabelar for their advancement triggers tutorial that helped me implement custom advancement triggers.
GhostRider2507 for helping me test the mod during development.

Sailcraft and its developers for inspiring this mod and for making what I still find to be the best mobile game I ever played. The game shut down on 28/08/2018, but I'm still hoping they'll one day make the game playable again.
Vazkii (and associates) for creating Patchouli, which allowed me to save extensive documentation for my mod with very little effort.
